text: Jeannine Brooke Riley (born October 1, 1940) is an American actress. She was born in Madera, California. She is known for her role as Billie Jo Bradley on the first two seasons of the CBS sitcom Petticoat Junction (1963-1965). Riley's movie roles include The Big Mouth (1967), Fever Heat (1968), The Comic (1969) and Electra Glide in Blue (1973). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from California Category:Living people
title: Jeannine Riley
